titleStmt.title: Reflections on a letter writ by a nameless author to the reverend clergy of both universities and on his bold reflections on the trinity &c. / by Richard Frankland.
titleStmt.author: Frankland, Richard, 1630-1698.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for A. & J. Churchill, and sold by F. Bently ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Trinity College Library, Cambridge University.
